data.title: EMC Delivers Modern and Intuitive User Experience for EMC Documentum
data.meta_description: /PRNewswire/ -- News Summary: EMC advances strategy to delight the New User by delivering a modern, intuitive and configurable user experience. Offers new...
data.text:
BERLIN, Nov. 1, 2011 /PRNewswire/ --

News Summary:

EMC advances strategy to delight the New User by delivering a modern, intuitive and configurable user experience.

Offers new approach for rapid time to value for content centric solutions.

EMC signs exclusive licensing agreement with C6.

Full Story:

BERLIN – November 1, 2011—At Momentum, the EMC Information Intelligence Group's global user conference, EMC Corporation (NYSE: EMC) today announced an exclusive licensing agreement with C6, a French Enterprise Content Management (ECM) software provider and long-time partner. As a result of the agreement, EMC is delivering EMC® Documentum® D2, a modern and highly-configurable application for rapidly building content solutions. Available now, the solution enables business analysts to rapidly match ECM application functionality to their business needs, without the need for coding.

Continuing to Delight the New User

Providing a simple and rich user experience, supporting Choice Computing, and commitment to device mobility are key drivers of EMC's thrust to support the New User, referred to as today's knowledge worker who determines when, where and how to access and interact with information on devices of their choice. Earlier this year, the company delivered the EMC Documentum Mobile app for the Apple iPad to provide users with true enterprise capabilities from anywhere. With the announcement today, EMC delivers another proof point of their strategy by simplifying the user experience for Documentum. This new capability enhances the productivity of knowledge workers by easily tailoring their user experience for their specific requirements.

EMC Documentum D2: A new approach for delivering content applications

Documentum D2 offers rapid time to value for building and delivering content centric solutions. Business analysts can be much more responsive to the needs of the business and accelerate time-to-value through the power of configuration with Documentum D2. In addition, administrators now have consistency of ECM rules and policies through this simplified information management approach based on configuration.

All the technology assets acquired as part of this agreement become part of the Documentum family. This technology is available now and already deployed at scale in many customer environments. EMC expects to announce product nomenclature and pricing shortly.

EMC Executive Quote:

Rick Devenuti, President of EMC's Information Intelligence Group

"EMC is thrilled to make Documentum easier to use, as we believe this is a major step forward in delighting the new user. We continue to make progress at addressing the complexity of building and maintaining content centric solutions by obviating the need for coding. We are pleased to welcome this addition to the Documentum family of solutions. With this announcement, we bring the best of both worlds to our customers: the power of industry leading Documentum platform with a modern and delightful user experience."

About EMC

EMC Corporation is a global leader in enabling businesses and service providers to transform their operations and deliver IT as a service. Fundamental to this transformation is cloud computing. Through innovative products and services, EMC accelerates the journey to cloud computing, helping IT departments to store, manage, protect and analyze their most valuable asset — information — in a more agile, trusted and cost-efficient way. Additional information about EMC can be found at www.EMC.com.
